question: the ratio of numbers is 3 : 4 and their h . c . f is 4 . their l . c . m is :
a 100 meter long train crosses a man standing on the platform in 5 sec . what is the speed of the train ?
the volumes of two cones are in the ratio 1 : 12 and the radii of the cones are in the ratio of 1 : 3 . what is the ratio of their heights ?

one ball will drop from a certain height . the height it will reach after rebounding from the floor is 50 percent of the previous height . the total travel is 200 cm when it touches the floor on third time . what is the value of the original height ?
from a pack of cards , two cards are drawn one after the other , with replacement . what is the probability that the first card is a black card and the second card is a king or queen ?
the h . c . f . of two numbers is 20 and the other two factors of their l . c . m . are 21 and 23 . the larger of the two numbers is

the toll t , in dollars , for a truck using a certain bridge is given by the formula t = 2.50 + 0.50 ( x − 2 ) , where x is the number of axles on the truck . what is the toll for an 18 - wheel truck that has 2 wheels on its front axle and 4 wheels on each of its other axles ?

there are 56 lights which are functional and each is controlled by a separate on / off switch . two children x and y start playing with the switches . x starts by pressing every third switch till he reaches the end . y , thereafter , presses every fifth switch till he too reaches the end . if all switches were in off position at the beggining , how many lights are switched on by the end of this operation ?

in traveling from a dormitory to a certain city , a student went 1 / 3 of the way by foot , 1 / 4 of the way by bus , and the remaining 5 kilometers by car . what is the distance , in kilometers , from the dormitory to the city ?

the length of a rectangle is twice its breadth . if its length is decreased by 5 cm and breadth is increased by 5 cm , the area of the rectangle is increased by 75 sq . cm . what is the length of the rectangle ?
at what rate percent on simple interest will rs . 750 amount to rs . 900 in 10 years ?
if 20 % of a = b , then b % of 20 is the same as :
walking at 5 / 6 of its usual speed , a train is 10 minutes too late . what is usual time to cover the journey ?

the length of a rectangle is two - fifths of the radius of a circle . the radius of the circle is equal to the side of the square , whose area is 1225 sq . units . what is the area ( in sq . units ) of the rectangle if the rectangle if the breadth is 10 units ?

a certain family has 3 sons : richard is 6 years older than david , and david is 8 years older than scott . if in 8 years , richard will be twice as old as scott , then how old was david 2 years ago ?
john has $ 1,600 at the beginning of his trip , after spending money , he still has exactly $ 800 less than he spent on the trip . how much money does john still have ?

at a local appliance manufacturing facility , the workers received a 10 % hourly pay raise due to extraordinary performance . if one worker decided to reduce the number of hours that he worked so that his overall pay would remain unchanged , by approximately what percent would he reduce the number of hours that he worked ?
in a school with 5 classes , each class has 2 students less than the previous class . how many students are there in the largest class if the total number of students at school is 100 ?
the standard deviation of a normal distribution of data is 2 , and 3 standard deviations below the mean is greater than 46 . what is a possible value for the mean of the distribution ?
if 12 men or 20 women can do a piece of work in 81 days , then in how many days can 9 men and 12 women together do the work ?
if a ã — b = 2 a - 3 b + ab , then 1 ã — 2 + 2 ã — 1 is equal to :
gold is 10 times as heavy as water and copper is 5 times as heavy as water . in what ratio should these be mixed to get an alloy 6 times as heavy as water ?
a semicircle has a radius of 11 . what is the approximate perimeter of the semicircle ?
a train 330 meters long is running with a speed of 60 kmph . in what time will it pass a man who is running at 6 kmph in the direction opposite to that in which the train is going ?
a group of students decided to collect as many paise from each member of group as is the number of members . if the total collection amounts to rs . 92.16 , the number of the member is the group is :

lionel left his house and walked towards walt ' s house , 48 miles away . two hours later , walt left his house and ran towards lionel ' s house . if lionel ' s speed was 3 miles per hour and walt ' s 3 miles per hour , how many miles had lionel walked when he met walt ?
if 20 men can build a wall 66 metres long in 12 days , what length of a similar can be built by 86 men in 8 days ?
in the set of positive integers from 1 to 70 , what is the sum of all the odd multiples of 5 ?
the population of a city increases by 7 % per year but due to migration it decrease by 1 % per years . what will be the percentage increase in population in 3 years ?
a is a positive integer and multiple of 2 ; p = 4 ^ a , what is the remainder when p is divided by 10 ?

from january 1 , 1991 , to january 1 , 1993 , the number of people enrolled in health maintenance organizations increased by 25 percent . the enrollment on january 1 , 1993 , was 45 million . how many million people , to the nearest million , were enrolled in health maintenance organizations on january 1 , 1991 ?
mr . john used to purchase certain number of mangoes for $ 360 since the price of mangoes is reduced by 10 % he got 12 more mangoes today . find the original price of 130 mangoes .
a courtyard is 25 meter long and 18 meter board is to be paved with bricks of dimensions 20 cm by 10 cm . the total number of bricks required is ?
a man swims downstream 28 km and upstream 12 km taking 2 hours each time , what is the speed of the man in still water ?

a car gets 32 miles to the gallon . if it is modified to use a solar panel , it will use only 80 percent as much fuel as it does now . if the fuel tank holds 12 gallons , how many more miles will the car be able to travel , per full tank of fuel , after it has been modified ?
what is the greatest possible length which can be used to measure exactly the lengths 180 m , 500 m and 15 m 20 cm ?

usc invited each south carolina high school to send up to 39 students to watch a football game . a section which has 199 seats in each row is reserved for those students . what is the least number of rows needed to guarantee that if 2006 students show up , then all students from the same high school can be seated in the same row ?
the area of a square is 4900 sq cm . find the ratio of the breadth and the length of a rectangle whose length is same the side of the square and breadth is 20 cm less than the side of the square ?

robert left from a pvt company . management hold his salary rs . 15000 / - for one month . earlier robert borrowed rs . 7280 / - from company . but robert forget that . after one month robert asked his salary and accountant gives rs . 18500 / - to him . what is the incentive amount given to robert ?

in a certain archery competition , points were awarded as follows : the first place winner receives 11 points , the second place winner receives 7 points , the third place winner receives 5 points and the fourth place winner receives 2 points . no other points are awarded . john participated several times in the competition and finished first , second , third , or fourth each time . the product of all the points he received was 107800 . how many times did he participate in the competition ?
evaluate 28 % of 650 + 45 % of 280
three numbers are in the ratio 3 : 4 : 5 and their l . c . m . is 1200 . their h . c . f is ?
sandy bought 65 books for $ 1380 from one shop and 55 books for $ 900 from another shop . what is the average price that sandy paid per book ?
in a class , 30 % of the students speaks truth , 20 % speaks lie and 10 % speaks both . if a student is selected at random , what is the probability that he has speak truth or lie ?

amit and ananthu can do a work in 15 days and 90 days respectively . amit started the work and left after 3 days . ananthu took over and completed the work . in how many days was the total work completed ?
$ 500 is divided amongst a , b and c so that a may get 2 / 3 as much as b and c together , b may get 6 / 9 as much as a and c together , then the share of a is

at the wholesale store you can buy an 8 - pack of hot dogs for $ 1.55 , a 20 - pack for $ 3.05 , and a 400 - pack for $ 22.95 . what is the greatest number of hot dogs you can buy at this store with $ 200 ?
a shopkeeper sold an article offering a discount of 5 % and earned a profit of 21.6 % . what would have been the percentage of profit earned if no discount was offered ?
the ratio of buses to cars on river road is 1 to 17 . if there are 80 fewer buses than cars on river road , how many cars are on river road ?

a grocery shop has a sale of rs . 6535 , rs . 6927 , rs . 6855 , rs . 7230 and rs . 6562 for 5 consecutive months . how much sale must he have in the sixth month so that he gets an average sale of rs . 6500 ?
